title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together with plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving a cup of cooking water.
Working quickly, add hot pasta to the pancetta, then remove from heat and add egg mixture, stirring constantly.
Add pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until lightly charred.
In a separate pan, fry onion and garlic until soft.
Add remaining paste and tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for another 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice.
